intro: Aneilema asperum, commonly known as the rough aneilema, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many ornamental and medicinal plants. The plant is characterized by its upright growth habit and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. Its leaves are typically rough to the touch, giving it its common name. Aneilema asperum is often grown as an ornamental plant for its attractive foliage and delicate blooms.
